website_summaries.verdict: Size 5 rugby ball that will work for training or recreational play.
pros: Perfect rugby ball to show off pride in the national team
Carries all of the official licenses
Includes bright scarlet and navy blue colors that stand out
cons: Price point is a little high
May not stand up well to rough use

customer_reviews.title: weirdly shaped at the seams
customer_reviews.text: lumpy ball due to the seams. also loses air very easily
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ball for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I collect official replica balls from around the world and this one didn’t disappoint! Inflated nicely and also stays inflated better than some!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Chapmon

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great quality makes this ball stand out from the rest. Comes deflated so have a ball pump ready. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ball looks and feels great. It behaves well, and stays inflated for a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a good ball. Feels tight and the construction is excellent. We loved it.
customer_reviews.author: R.R.

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Gave as gift. Only issue was, when it's inflated all the way. It still looks baggy on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Cassadi

customer_reviews.title: It barley lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: It was great UNTIL it stopped holding air? Idk what h a ppened...but it was expensive and its done already 😟
customer_reviews.author: lynn m.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Great Item for the Rugby Player
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Great item, does need to be inflated some times. But overall great item.
customer_reviews.author: Cpronzato

customer_reviews.title: Deflates really easily
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much have to inflate it before every use, but serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Deflate Gate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball a month ago and was only able to play with it one time before it stopped holding air.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball with great grip. Can't go wrong with Gilbert balls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would come inflated other than that what I was wanting
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: i orderd 3 of them and they all had holes in them something or someone screwed up
customer_reviews.text: i orderd 3 of them and they all had holes in them something or someone screwed up the proudction process
customer_reviews.author: Austin Sciacca

customer_reviews.title: "New Ball" was dirty and worn IN the packaging
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt of the ball I found that while it had been shipped in a bag, it was worn and dirty before it was placed into the bag. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Albion A Norman

product_meta.title: Gilbert USA Official Replica Rugby Ball
product_meta.description: Gilbert high-grade ball with official USA logo on side. Replica ball has a synthetic latex bladder to ensure it remains inflated for the maximum length of time when on display. Navy/Scarlet. Available in size 5.
